reports.title: Parking
reports.query: match(p:POI:OSMNode)-[:TAGS]-(t:Tag) where t.amenity='parking' or exists(t.parking) return p

reports.title: Types of POIs
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Tag)
WHERE EXISTS(t.amenity)
RETURN t.amenity AS amenityValue, COUNT(t) AS occurrenceCount
ORDER BY occurrenceCount DESC;

reports.title: Number of FootNodes in top 10 components
reports.query:
match (n:FootNode)
with n.componentId as id
return id, count(id) as sum
order by sum desc
limit 10

reports.title: Best path
reports.query:
CALL apoc.do.when(
$neodash_algo = 'astar',
'MATCH (poi1:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_1})
WITH collect(poi1) AS targetPois1
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r1:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois1) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois1
      })
WITH a, r1.distance AS distance1
ORDER BY distance1 DESC
LIMIT 1
WITH a 
MATCH (poi2:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_2})
WITH a, collect(poi2) AS targetPois2
MATCH (b:FootNode)<-[r2:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois2) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois2
      })
WITH a, b, r2.distance AS distance2
ORDER BY distance2 ASC
LIMIT 1
WITH a, b
CALL apoc.algo.aStar(
 a,
 b,
 "ROUTE",
 $neodash_weight, "lat", "lon"
) YIELD path, weight
WITH [n IN nodes(path) | n.id] AS shortestHopNodeIds,
[r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds, a, b
UNWIND shortestHopRelIds as shortrel
MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
where id(r)=shortrel
RETURN n1, n2, r, a, b',
'MATCH (poi1:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_1})
WITH collect(poi1) AS targetPois1
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r1:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois1) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois1
      })
WITH a, r1.distance AS distance1
ORDER BY distance1 ASC
LIMIT 1
WITH a 
MATCH (poi2:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_2})
WITH a, collect(poi2) AS targetPois2
MATCH (b:FootNode)<-[r2:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois2) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois2
      })
WITH a, b, r2.distance AS distance2
ORDER BY distance2 DESC
LIMIT 1
WITH a, b
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(
 a,
 b,
 "ROUTE",
 $neodash_weight
) YIELD path, weight
WITH [n IN nodes(path) | n.id] AS shortestHopNodeIds,
[r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds, a, b
UNWIND shortestHopRelIds as shortrel
MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
where id(r)=shortrel
RETURN n1, n2, r, shortestHopNodeIds, a, b',
{neodash_path_finding_algorithm: $neodash_path_finding_algorithm, neodash_tag_name_1: $neodash_tag_name_1, neodash_tag_name_2: $neodash_tag_name_2, neodash_weight: $neodash_weight}) yield value
with value.n1 as s1, value.n2 as s2, value.r as r, value.shortestHopNodeIds as shortestHopNodeIds,
case when value.n1.id = value.a.id or value.n1.id = value.b.id then 'red' else 'transparent' end as color
return {id: id(s1), label: "FootNode", point: s1.location, color: color}, r

formFields.query:
MATCH (n:`Tag`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

MATCH (n:`Tag`) 
WHERE toLower(toString(n.`name`)) CONTAINS toLower($input) 
RETURN DISTINCT n.`name` as value,  n.`name` as display ORDER BY size(toString(value)) ASC LIMIT 5

reports.title: Weight
reports.query:
with ['distance',  'green_area_weight'] as weights
unwind weights as w
return 'Select' as Select, w

reports.title: Path finding alfìgorithm
reports.query:
with ['astar',  'dijkstra'] as algorithms
unwind algorithms as algo
return 'Select' as Select, algo

reports.title: Best path cost
reports.query:
CALL apoc.do.when(
$neodash_algo = 'astar',
'MATCH (poi1:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_1})
WITH collect(poi1) AS targetPois1
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r1:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois1) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois1
      })
WITH a, r1.distance AS distance1
ORDER BY distance1 DESC
LIMIT 1
WITH a 
MATCH (poi2:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_2})
WITH a, collect(poi2) AS targetPois2
MATCH (b:FootNode)<-[r2:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois2) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois2
      })
WITH a, b, r2.distance AS distance2
ORDER BY distance2 ASC
LIMIT 1
WITH a, b
CALL apoc.algo.aStar(
 a,
 b,
 "ROUTE",
 $neodash_weight, "lat", "lon"
) YIELD path, weight
WITH [n IN nodes(path) | n.id] AS shortestHopNodeIds,
[r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds
UNWIND shortestHopRelIds as shortrel
MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
where id(r)=shortrel
RETURN n1, n2, r, sum(r.distance) as sumdist, sum(r.green_area_weight) as green',
'MATCH (poi1:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_1})
WITH collect(poi1) AS targetPois1
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r1:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois1) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois1
      })
WITH a, r1.distance AS distance1
ORDER BY distance1 ASC
LIMIT 1
WITH a 
MATCH (poi2:POI)-[:TAGS]->(:Tag {name: $neodash_tag_name_2})
WITH a, collect(poi2) AS targetPois2
MATCH (b:FootNode)<-[r2:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois2) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois2
      })
WITH a, b, r2.distance AS distance2
ORDER BY distance2 DESC
LIMIT 1
WITH a, b
CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(
 a,
 b,
 "ROUTE",
 $neodash_weight
) YIELD path, weight
WITH [n IN nodes(path) | n.id] AS shortestHopNodeIds,
[r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds
UNWIND shortestHopRelIds as shortrel
MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
where id(r)=shortrel
RETURN n1, n2, r, sum(r.distance) as sumdist, sum(r.green_area_weight) as green',
{neodash_path_finding_algorithm: $neodash_path_finding_algorithm, neodash_tag_name_1: $neodash_tag_name_1, neodash_tag_name_2: $neodash_tag_name_2, neodash_weight: $neodash_weight}) yield value
return sum(value.sumdist) as distance, sum(value.green) as green_area_weight

reports.title: Select up to 9 POIs
reports.query:
match (t:Tag)
where t.name is not null 
and size(t.name)>3
and (t.tourism='attraction' or t.amenity='place_of_worship' or t.place='square' or t.amenity='fountain')
with distinct t.name as name, coalesce(t.amenity, t.place, t.tourism) as type
return name as Name, type as Type
order by name asc

reports.title: Best path
reports.query:
CALL apoc.do.when(
$neodash_algo_tsp = 'astar',
'WITH $neodash_pois_tsp as selection
UNWIND selection as name
MATCH (t:Tag {name: name})<-[:TAGS]-(poi:POI)
WITH name, collect(poi) AS targetPois
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois
      })
WITH name, a, r.distance AS distance
ORDER BY name, distance ASC
with name, 
       collect(a)[0] AS closestFootNode
with collect(closestFootNode) as footnodes
            UNWIND footnodes as c1 
                WITH 
                  c1, 
                  [c in footnodes where c.id > c1.id] as c2s, 
                  footnodes 
                UNWIND c2s as c2 
                    CALL apoc.algo.aStar(
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      "ROUTE",
                      $neodash_weight_tsp, "lat", "lon") 
                    YIELD path, weight 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      weight as totalCost, 
                      [n in nodes(path) | n.id] as shortestHopNodeIds, 
                      [r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds, 
                      footnodes 
                    MERGE (c1) -[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]- (c2) 
                    SET r.cost = totalCost 
                    SET r.shortestHopNodeIds = shortestHopNodeIds
                    SET r.shortestHopRelIds = shortestHopRelIds 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      (size(footnodes)-1) as level, 
                      footnodes 
                    CALL apoc.path.expandConfig(
                      c1, 
                      { relationshipFilter: "SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO", 
                        minLevel: level, 
                        maxLevel: level, 
                        whitelistNodes: footnodes, 
                        terminatorNodes: [c2], 
                        uniqueness: "NODE_PATH" } ) 
                    YIELD path
                    WITH nodes(path) as orderedFootnodes, 
                    [node in nodes(path) | node.id] as orderedIds,
                    reduce(cost = 0, x in relationships(path) | cost + x.cost) as totalCost, 
                    [r in relationships(path) | r.shortestHopNodeIds] as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    MATCH (:FootNode {id: orderedIds[0]})-[rel:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: reverse(orderedIds)[0]})
                    WITH orderedFootnodes+orderedFootnodes[0] as orderedFootnodes, orderedIds+orderedIds[0] as orderedIds, totalCost+rel.cost as totalCost, shortestRouteNodeIds as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    ORDER BY totalCost LIMIT 1
                    UNWIND range(0, size(orderedFootnodes)) as index 
                        UNWIND shortestRouteNodeIds[index] as shortestHopNodeId 
                            WITH orderedFootnodes, 
                            totalCost,
                            index,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(shortestRouteNodeIds[index][0]) = toString(orderedIds[index])
                                THEN tail(collect(shortestHopNodeId)) 
                                ELSE tail(reverse(collect(shortestHopNodeId))) 
                            END as orderedHopNodeIds 
                            ORDER BY index 
                            UNWIND orderedHopNodeIds as orderedHopNodeId 
                                MATCH (c:FootNode) where c.id = orderedHopNodeId 
                                with 
                                  [c in orderedFootnodes | c.id] as orderedFootnodesIds, 
                                  totalCost,
                                  orderedFootnodes[0].id as first,
                                  orderedFootnodes[size(orderedFootnodes)-2].id as last,
                                  [orderedFootnodes[0].id] + collect(c.id) as footnodeRouteIds
                            MATCH (:FootNode {id: toString(first)})-[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: toString(last)})
                            with orderedFootnodesIds, totalCost, footnodeRouteIds, r,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(r.shortestHopNodeIds[0]) = toString(last)
                                THEN tail(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item))
                                ELSE tail(reverse(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item)))
                            END as lastpath
                            with footnodeRouteIds+lastpath as totalPath, orderedFootnodesIds as poi_nodes
							MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
							where n1.id in totalPath
                            and n2.id in totalPath
							RETURN n1 as start_node, n2 as end_node, r as rel, poi_nodes
							',
'WITH $neodash_pois_tsp as selection
UNWIND selection as name
MATCH (t:Tag {name: name})<-[:TAGS]-(poi:POI)
WITH name, collect(poi) AS targetPois
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois
      })
WITH name, a, r.distance AS distance
ORDER BY name, distance ASC
with name, 
       collect(a)[0] AS closestFootNode
with collect(closestFootNode) as footnodes
            UNWIND footnodes as c1 
                WITH 
                  c1, 
                  [c in footnodes where c.id > c1.id] as c2s, 
                  footnodes 
                UNWIND c2s as c2 
                    CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      "ROUTE",
                      $neodash_weight_tsp) 
                    YIELD path, weight 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      weight as totalCost, 
                      [n in nodes(path) | n.id] as shortestHopNodeIds, 
                      [r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds, 
                      footnodes 
                    MERGE (c1) -[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]- (c2) 
                    SET r.cost = totalCost 
                    SET r.shortestHopNodeIds = shortestHopNodeIds
                    SET r.shortestHopRelIds = shortestHopRelIds 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      (size(footnodes)-1) as level, 
                      footnodes 
                    CALL apoc.path.expandConfig(
                      c1, 
                      { relationshipFilter: "SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO", 
                        minLevel: level, 
                        maxLevel: level, 
                        whitelistNodes: footnodes, 
                        terminatorNodes: [c2], 
                        uniqueness: "NODE_PATH" } ) 
                    YIELD path
                    WITH nodes(path) as orderedFootnodes, 
                    [node in nodes(path) | node.id] as orderedIds,
                    reduce(cost = 0, x in relationships(path) | cost + x.cost) as totalCost, 
                    [r in relationships(path) | r.shortestHopNodeIds] as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    MATCH (:FootNode {id: orderedIds[0]})-[rel:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: reverse(orderedIds)[0]})
                    WITH orderedFootnodes+orderedFootnodes[0] as orderedFootnodes, orderedIds+orderedIds[0] as orderedIds, totalCost+rel.cost as totalCost, shortestRouteNodeIds as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    ORDER BY totalCost LIMIT 1
                    UNWIND range(0, size(orderedFootnodes)) as index 
                        UNWIND shortestRouteNodeIds[index] as shortestHopNodeId 
                            WITH orderedFootnodes, 
                            totalCost,
                            index,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(shortestRouteNodeIds[index][0]) = toString(orderedIds[index])
                                THEN tail(collect(shortestHopNodeId)) 
                                ELSE tail(reverse(collect(shortestHopNodeId))) 
                            END as orderedHopNodeIds 
                            ORDER BY index 
                            UNWIND orderedHopNodeIds as orderedHopNodeId 
                                MATCH (c:FootNode) where c.id = orderedHopNodeId 
                                with 
                                  [c in orderedFootnodes | c.id] as orderedFootnodesIds, 
                                  totalCost,
                                  orderedFootnodes[0].id as first,
                                  orderedFootnodes[size(orderedFootnodes)-2].id as last,
                                  [orderedFootnodes[0].id] + collect(c.id) as footnodeRouteIds
                            MATCH (:FootNode {id: toString(first)})-[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: toString(last)})
                            with orderedFootnodesIds, totalCost, footnodeRouteIds, r,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(r.shortestHopNodeIds[0]) = toString(last)
                                THEN tail(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item))
                                ELSE tail(reverse(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item)))
                            END as lastpath
                            with footnodeRouteIds+lastpath as totalPath, orderedFootnodesIds as poi_nodes
							MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
							where n1.id in totalPath
                            and n2.id in totalPath
							RETURN n1 as start_node, n2 as end_node, r as rel, poi_nodes',
{neodash_algo_tsp: $neodash_algo_tsp, neodash_weight_tsp: $neodash_weight_tsp, neodash_pois_tsp: $neodash_pois_tsp}) yield value
with value.start_node as s, value.rel as r, 
case when value.start_node.id in value.poi_nodes then 'red' else 'transparent' end  as color
return {id: id(s), label: "FootNode", point: s.location, color: color}, r

reports.title: Weight
reports.query:
with ['distance',  'green_area_weight'] as weights
unwind weights as w
return 'Select' as Select, w

reports.title: Path finding algorithm
reports.query:
with ['astar',  'dijkstra'] as algorithms
unwind algorithms as algo
return 'Select' as Select, algo

reports.title: Best path cost
reports.query:
CALL apoc.do.when(
$neodash_algo_tsp = 'astar',
'WITH $neodash_pois_tsp as selection
UNWIND selection as name
MATCH (t:Tag {name: name})<-[:TAGS]-(poi:POI)
WITH name, collect(poi) AS targetPois
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois
      })
WITH name, a, r.distance AS distance
ORDER BY name, distance ASC
with name, 
       collect(a)[0] AS closestFootNode
with collect(closestFootNode) as footnodes
            UNWIND footnodes as c1 
                WITH 
                  c1, 
                  [c in footnodes where c.id > c1.id] as c2s, 
                  footnodes 
                UNWIND c2s as c2 
                    CALL apoc.algo.aStar(
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      "ROUTE",
                      $neodash_weight_tsp, "lat", "lon") 
                    YIELD path, weight 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      weight as totalCost, 
                      [n in nodes(path) | n.id] as shortestHopNodeIds, 
                      [r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds, 
                      footnodes 
                    MERGE (c1) -[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]- (c2) 
                    SET r.cost = totalCost 
                    SET r.shortestHopNodeIds = shortestHopNodeIds
                    SET r.shortestHopRelIds = shortestHopRelIds 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      (size(footnodes)-1) as level, 
                      footnodes 
                    CALL apoc.path.expandConfig(
                      c1, 
                      { relationshipFilter: "SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO", 
                        minLevel: level, 
                        maxLevel: level, 
                        whitelistNodes: footnodes, 
                        terminatorNodes: [c2], 
                        uniqueness: "NODE_PATH" } ) 
                    YIELD path
                    WITH nodes(path) as orderedFootnodes, 
                    [node in nodes(path) | node.id] as orderedIds,
                    reduce(cost = 0, x in relationships(path) | cost + x.cost) as totalCost, 
                    [r in relationships(path) | r.shortestHopNodeIds] as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    MATCH (:FootNode {id: orderedIds[0]})-[rel:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: reverse(orderedIds)[0]})
                    WITH orderedFootnodes+orderedFootnodes[0] as orderedFootnodes, orderedIds+orderedIds[0] as orderedIds, totalCost+rel.cost as totalCost, shortestRouteNodeIds as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    ORDER BY totalCost LIMIT 1
                    UNWIND range(0, size(orderedFootnodes)) as index 
                        UNWIND shortestRouteNodeIds[index] as shortestHopNodeId 
                            WITH orderedFootnodes, 
                            totalCost,
                            index,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(shortestRouteNodeIds[index][0]) = toString(orderedIds[index])
                                THEN tail(collect(shortestHopNodeId)) 
                                ELSE tail(reverse(collect(shortestHopNodeId))) 
                            END as orderedHopNodeIds 
                            ORDER BY index 
                            UNWIND orderedHopNodeIds as orderedHopNodeId 
                                MATCH (c:FootNode) where c.id = orderedHopNodeId 
                                with 
                                  [c in orderedFootnodes | c.id] as orderedFootnodesIds, 
                                  totalCost,
                                  orderedFootnodes[0].id as first,
                                  orderedFootnodes[size(orderedFootnodes)-2].id as last,
                                  [orderedFootnodes[0].id] + collect(c.id) as footnodeRouteIds
                            MATCH (:FootNode {id: toString(first)})-[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: toString(last)})
                            with orderedFootnodesIds, totalCost, footnodeRouteIds, r,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(r.shortestHopNodeIds[0]) = toString(last)
                                THEN tail(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item))
                                ELSE tail(reverse(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item)))
                            END as lastpath
                            with footnodeRouteIds+lastpath as totalPath
							MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
							where n1.id in totalPath
                            and n2.id in totalPath
							RETURN sum(r.distance) as totdistance, sum(r.green_area_weight) as totgreen
							',
'WITH $neodash_pois_tsp as selection
UNWIND selection as name
MATCH (t:Tag {name: name})<-[:TAGS]-(poi:POI)
WITH name, collect(poi) AS targetPois
MATCH (a:FootNode)<-[r:NEAR]-(x)
WHERE (x IN targetPois) OR 
      (x:OSMNode AND EXISTS {
        MATCH (x)-[:PART_OF]->(p) 
        WHERE p IN targetPois
      })
WITH name, a, r.distance AS distance
ORDER BY name, distance ASC
with name, 
       collect(a)[0] AS closestFootNode
with collect(closestFootNode) as footnodes
            UNWIND footnodes as c1 
                WITH 
                  c1, 
                  [c in footnodes where c.id > c1.id] as c2s, 
                  footnodes 
                UNWIND c2s as c2 
                    CALL apoc.algo.dijkstra(
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      "ROUTE",
                      $neodash_weight_tsp) 
                    YIELD path, weight 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      weight as totalCost, 
                      [n in nodes(path) | n.id] as shortestHopNodeIds, 
                      [r in relationships(path) | id(r)] as shortestHopRelIds, 
                      footnodes 
                    MERGE (c1) -[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]- (c2) 
                    SET r.cost = totalCost 
                    SET r.shortestHopNodeIds = shortestHopNodeIds
                    SET r.shortestHopRelIds = shortestHopRelIds 
                    WITH 
                      c1, 
                      c2, 
                      (size(footnodes)-1) as level, 
                      footnodes 
                    CALL apoc.path.expandConfig(
                      c1, 
                      { relationshipFilter: "SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO", 
                        minLevel: level, 
                        maxLevel: level, 
                        whitelistNodes: footnodes, 
                        terminatorNodes: [c2], 
                        uniqueness: "NODE_PATH" } ) 
                    YIELD path
                    WITH nodes(path) as orderedFootnodes, 
                    [node in nodes(path) | node.id] as orderedIds,
                    reduce(cost = 0, x in relationships(path) | cost + x.cost) as totalCost, 
                    [r in relationships(path) | r.shortestHopNodeIds] as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    MATCH (:FootNode {id: orderedIds[0]})-[rel:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: reverse(orderedIds)[0]})
                    WITH orderedFootnodes+orderedFootnodes[0] as orderedFootnodes, orderedIds+orderedIds[0] as orderedIds, totalCost+rel.cost as totalCost, shortestRouteNodeIds as shortestRouteNodeIds
                    ORDER BY totalCost LIMIT 1
                    UNWIND range(0, size(orderedFootnodes)) as index 
                        UNWIND shortestRouteNodeIds[index] as shortestHopNodeId 
                            WITH orderedFootnodes, 
                            totalCost,
                            index,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(shortestRouteNodeIds[index][0]) = toString(orderedIds[index])
                                THEN tail(collect(shortestHopNodeId)) 
                                ELSE tail(reverse(collect(shortestHopNodeId))) 
                            END as orderedHopNodeIds 
                            ORDER BY index 
                            UNWIND orderedHopNodeIds as orderedHopNodeId 
                                MATCH (c:FootNode) where c.id = orderedHopNodeId 
                                with 
                                  [c in orderedFootnodes | c.id] as orderedFootnodesIds, 
                                  totalCost,
                                  orderedFootnodes[0].id as first,
                                  orderedFootnodes[size(orderedFootnodes)-2].id as last,
                                  [orderedFootnodes[0].id] + collect(c.id) as footnodeRouteIds
                            MATCH (:FootNode {id: toString(first)})-[r:SHORTEST_ROUTE_TO]-(:FootNode {id: toString(last)})
                            with orderedFootnodesIds, totalCost, footnodeRouteIds, r,
                            CASE 
                                WHEN toString(r.shortestHopNodeIds[0]) = toString(last)
                                THEN tail(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item))
                                ELSE tail(reverse(REDUCE(s = [], item IN r.shortestHopNodeIds | s + item)))
                            END as lastpath
                            with footnodeRouteIds+lastpath as totalPath
							MATCH (n1:FootNode)-[r:ROUTE]-(n2:FootNode)
							where n1.id in totalPath
                            and n2.id in totalPath
							RETURN sum(r.distance) as totdistance, sum(r.green_area_weight) as totgreen',
{neodash_algo_tsp: $neodash_algo_tsp, neodash_weight_tsp: $neodash_weight_tsp, neodash_pois_tsp: $neodash_pois_tsp}) yield value
return sum(value.totdistance) as distance, sum(value.totgreen) as green_area_weight
